policies.name: Financial Integrity & Neutrality
policies.content: AI must not recommend specific stocks or cryptocurrencies to avoid unlicensed financial advice liability. Any discussion of investment must include a mandatory disclaimer that past performance does not guarantee future results. Strict prohibition on promising 'risk-free' or 'guaranteed' returns on volatile assets.
policies.summary: AI cannot recommend specific investments or guarantee returns on volatile assets.

policies.name: Healthcare Data Privacy (HIPAA)
policies.content: The system must not exfiltrate PII or PHI. Any demographics that could lead to a 'Mosaic Effect' re-identification (e.g. 5-digit Zip + Birth Date + Gender) must be flagged. Data enrichment from public voter logs is prohibited for lifestyle risk mapping without explicit consent.
policies.summary: Prohibits patient re-identification and unauthorized data enrichment in healthcare workflows.

policies.name: GDPR Sovereignty & Erasure
policies.content: EU user data must not cross sovereignty boundaries (us-east-1). Right to be Forgotten (Erasure) must be supported. Storing 'Legal Names' in plain text on an immutable blockchain is strictly forbidden to allow for PII removal.
policies.summary: Enforces regional data residency and the 'Right to Erasure' for EU users.

policies.name: Agentic Governance: Tool Control
policies.content: AI agents are prohibited from calling high-privilege tools (e.g. system_kill_switch, db_drop_tables) unless 2FA is verified. Every tool call must be intercepted and logged to the immutable audit ledger. Direct terminal execution is denied.
policies.summary: Restricts agent agency and enforces 2FA for sensitive system tool calls.
